keyMappings:
# Closing Tabs
map ww closeOtherTabs
map wq closeTabsOnLeft
map we closeTabsOnRight
map u removeTab

# Scroll/Next/Prev
map H goPrevious
map L goNext
map h goBack
map l goForward

# unmap unneeded
unmap d
unmap B

# Reload
map R reload hard

# Omnibar
unmap O
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

# tabs
unmap T
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map b visitPreviousTab
map g0 lastTab
map g1 firstTab
unmap g$

# Links
map yn LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
